Content.title: Geoff Beaumont
Content.name: Geoff Beaumont
Content.bodyText:
Hi Darren,

The source link on the Umbraco projects site is broken (or your svn repository is down!).

The link to the project page is now http://our.umbraco.org/projects/website-utilities/auto-link - probably following the reorganising they're doing at the moment.
